## Meet the team


### [Ziqian Xia](https://ziqian-xia.tech/)
:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="40%"}
![](pics/avatar.jpg){width=150}
:::

::: {.column width="60%"}

Ziqian Xia is the driving force behind this groundbreaking project. With a rich academic background that spans Economic Statistics, Psychology, and Environmental Policy, Ziqian's research interests lie at the intersection of human behavior, technology, and environmental conservation. Ziqian's journey has been marked by a passionate pursuit of understanding the human dimension of climate change.

### Jianxun Yang

Jianxun Yang is the team's data maestro. With a knack for diving deep into datasets and extracting meaningful insights, Jianxun's role as a data analyst and co-author has been crucial. His analytical prowess ensures that the research is backed by robust data, making the findings both compelling and credible.
